If you are in the mood for a racing game, with no options besides car color, with handling that is circa N64/PSX, this game is for you!

If you are in the mood to support a Developer" that obviously has no passion for the Industry
date: and is just trying to make a buck
recommended:
this game is for you.

reviewText: Okay, I bought this game and after only a couple of minutes I deem it a waste of hard drive space, even if itÂ´s just a 2GB download. I was expecting something like the flash based games I enjoyed in my youth like need for madness and the like. Turns out those 10 year old browser games are still superior in terms of gameplay, and, suprisingly, even graphics.

reviewText:
Sure, it's not Gran Turismo or Destruction Derby.  The headlights might be unnecessary during the daytime and the speedo might be out of sync by about 70mph with the sense of speed.  There's also a very good chance I will never play this game again, other than launching it for the requisite 5 minutes so I can write this review, but given that the game was made by one budding developer over the course of 7 months - for that, it deserves a thumbs up.

However, the price also needs to be realistic and relative to the quality, therefore it needs to drop by about 80%.

:o)
